casebody.data:
Delvin C. PAYTON, et al., Plaintiff-Appellees, v. COUNTY OF KANE, et al., Defendants-Appellants. No. 00-3789. United States Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. Jan. 27, 2003.

Before BAUER, COFFEY, and DIANE P. WOOD, Circuit Judges.

*387ORDER

On consideration of the petitions for rehearing and petitions for rehearing en banc, no judge in active service has requested a vote * on the petitions for rehearing en banc and all of the judges on the original panel have voted to deny rehearing. It is, therefore, ORDERED that rehearing and rehearing en banc are DENIED.

Chief Judge Joel M. Flaum did not participate in consideration of these petitions.
